title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Integrate any agent framework with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore (AIM396)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 将任何代理框架与 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 集成 (AIM396)
abstract: Bring existing agents to AWS with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore. Whether you've built custom agents or use frameworks like LangChain, LangGraph, CrewAI, or LlamaIndex, this session shows how to run them on secure, scalable AWS infrastructure without rewriting your logic. Discover how AgentCore's API-based orchestration integrates external agent frameworks and services, centralizing tooling, observability, memory, and security. Learn how Cohere Health successfully integrated their healthcare workflow agents with AgentCore to enable secure, scalable processing of healthcare prior authorization decisions, leveraging AgentCore's services like Runtime and Memory to meet strict healthcare compliance requirements while maintaining the flexibility to use their chosen frameworks.
abstract_cn: 使用Amazon Bedrock AgentCore将现有代理迁移到AWS。无论您构建了自定义代理还是使用LangChain、LangGraph、CrewAI或LlamaIndex等框架，本会议展示如何在安全、可扩展的AWS基础设施上运行它们，而无需重写您的逻辑。了解AgentCore基于API的编排如何集成外部代理框架和服务，集中化工具、可观测性、内存和安全性。学习Cohere Health如何成功将其医疗工作流代理与AgentCore集成，实现医疗预授权决策的安全、可扩展处理，利用AgentCore的Runtime和Memory等服务满足严格的医疗合规要求，同时保持使用其选择框架的灵活性。

presenter.name: Aris Tsakpinis
presenter.title: Sr WW Specialist SA, Amazon Bedrock
